title: Episode 34: Timeout Revisited - Dealing with Challenging Kids Part 2
description:
Here’s the second part of my episode on alternatives to timeout. In this part of the interview, Dr. Ablon discusses Plan B in more detail. How do you work with your child to come up with solutions...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Here's the second half of my interview with Dr. Ablon. Learn in detail how how Plan B can work with your children.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
